Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.view.cli

Class CoolCLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.view.cli.CoolCLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewInterface
public class CoolCLI
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewInterface
This is the class used to display a beautiful and cool cli. Works with UNIX terminals, need support of Unicode and 255-colors

"We made the buttons on the screen look so good you'll want to lick them" S.Jobs

    • position

      private int[] position​(java.util.List<int[]> occupied, int[] starting, Colors color)
      Method used to position the first time the workers
      Parameters:
      occupied - list of coordinates already occupied by a worker, so nt allowed
      starting - coordinates where to start displaying the selector
      Returns:
      the coordinates of the chosen cell

    • positionAllowed

      private int[] positionAllowed​(java.lang.Integer[] starting, java.util.List<int[]> allowed, char kind)
      Method used when a player can select a cell for build or to move
      Parameters:
      starting - coordinates of the cell where start displaying the selector
      allowed - List of coordinates allowed to choose
      kind - m for a move else it'sa build
      Returns:
      the coordinates choosen for move or for build, if user wants to back to selection of workers it returns a negative coordinate -1,-1

    • chooseblock

      private int chooseblock​(java.lang.String[] nameBlks, int[] position)
      Method used when a payer can position two or more different kind of blocks in a cell. This allows to choose using the keyboard and displays a preview of the block to build
      Parameters:
      nameBlks - the names of available blocks
      position - coordinates on map where to show the block
      Returns:
      the level to build as index

      Returns:

    • getMyWorkers

      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer[]> getMyWorkers()
      Helper method to het a map of all the workers of a player with their location
      Returns:
      a map with for each id of worker it's location as array of integer [x,y]

    • contains

      private boolean contains​(java.util.List<int[]> intsList, int x, int y)
      Helper method to check if in a list of coordinates array there are the specified coordinates x, y
      Parameters:
      intsList - input list of coordinates as int[]
      x - coordinate x
      y - coordinate y
      Returns:
      true if x,y is contained in the list of coordinates
